name: collectionView(_:willDisplaySupplementaryView:forElementKind:at:)
desc: Notifies the delegate that the specified supplementary view is about to be displayed by the collection view.
declaration:
optional func collectionView(_ collectionView: NSCollectionView, 
willDisplaySupplementaryView view: NSView, 
              forElementKind elementKind: NSCollectionView.SupplementaryElementKind, 
                          at indexPath: IndexPath)
